import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { registerUser } from '../../store/AuthSlice' import { StyleFrom } from '../../style/StyleForm' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logoHome from "../../images/mepelaozen.png" function Register() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const auth = useSelector((state)=>state.auth) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ if(auth._id){ navigate("/home") } },[auth._id, navigate]) const [user,setUser] = useState({ name:"", email:"", password:"" }) const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(registerUser(user)) } return ( <> {/*

Register

setUser({...user, name:e.target.value})}/> setUser({...user, email:e.target.value})}/> setUser({...user, password:e.target.value})}/> { auth.registerStatus === "rejected" ?

{auth.registerError}

: null} */}

הרשמה

setUser({...user, name:e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, email:e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, password:e.target.value})}/>
{ auth.registerStatus === "נדחה" ?

{auth.registerError}

: null}

כבר יש לך חשבון? לחץ כאן

) } export default Register
